finalproject.ece558.edu.pdx.ece.brailleblackjack

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalproject.ece558.edu.pdx.ece.brailleblackjack.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a deck and it manages the deck database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck(android.content.Context context)
      Deck Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCardsToDB(android.content.Context context)
      Add a whole deck of cards to the database.
      Card getCard(java.lang.String key)
      This method queries and retrieves a card's information from the database using the key to query the database
      long insertCard(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String description, int drawable, int value)
      This method adds a card to the database Each row must have a card key (what the card is) the card's description for Android Voice-Over the card's drawable image integer and the card's value as an integer (1-10) NOTE: Ace will be identified as 1 but it has a possible value of 11

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addCardsToDB

        public void addCardsToDB(android.content.Context context)
        Add a whole deck of cards to the database.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the caller

      • getCard

        public Card getCard(java.lang.String key)
        This method queries and retrieves a card's information from the database using the key to query the database
        Parameters:
        key - String of the card ID
        Returns:
        Card object, see Class Card

      • insertCard

        public long insertCard(java.lang.String key,
              java.lang.String description,
              int drawable,
              int value)
        This method adds a card to the database Each row must have a card key (what the card is) the card's description for Android Voice-Over the card's drawable image integer and the card's value as an integer (1-10) NOTE: Ace will be identified as 1 but it has a possible value of 11
        Parameters:
        key - String of Card id
        description - String of card description
        drawable - Integer of resource pointer
        value - Integer of card value
        Returns:
        Long of the id of the database insert
